00014 #ifndef VALIDATION_RMSE_TERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED

00017 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>

00019 namespace mlpack
00020 {
00021 namespace amf
00022 {
00023 template <class MatType>
00024 class ValidationRMSETermination
00025 {
00026  public:
00027   ValidationRMSETermination(MatType& V,
00028                             size_t num_test_points,
00029                             double tolerance = 1e-5,
00030                             size_t maxIterations = 10000,
00031                             size_t reverseStepTolerance = 3)
00032         : tolerance(tolerance),
00033           maxIterations(maxIterations),
00034           num_test_points(num_test_points),
00035           reverseStepTolerance(reverseStepTolerance)
00036   {
00037     size_t n = V.n_rows;
00038     size_t m = V.n_cols;
00039 
00040     test_points.zeros(num_test_points, 3);
00041 
00042     for(size_t i = 0; i < num_test_points; i++)
00043     {
00044       double t_val;
00045       size_t t_row;
00046       size_t t_col;
00047       do
00048       {
00049         t_row = rand() % n;
00050         t_col = rand() % m;
00051       } while((t_val = V(t_row, t_col)) == 0);
00052 
00053       test_points(i, 0) = t_row;
00054       test_points(i, 1) = t_col;
00055       test_points(i, 2) = t_val;
00056       V(t_row, t_col) = 0;
00057     }
00058   }
00059 
00060   void Initialize(const MatType& /* V */)
00061   {
00062     iteration = 1;
00063 
00064     rmse = DBL_MAX;
00065     rmseOld = DBL_MAX;
00066 
00067     c_index = 0;
00068     c_indexOld = 0;
00069 
00070     reverseStepCount = 0;
00071     isCopy = false;
00072   }
00073 
00074   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00075   {
00076     // Calculate norm of WH after each iteration.
00077     arma::mat WH;
00078 
00079     WH = W * H;
00080 
00081     if (iteration != 0)
00082     {
00083       rmseOld = rmse;
00084       rmse = 0;
00085       for(size_t i = 0; i < num_test_points; i++)
00086       {
00087         size_t t_row = test_points(i, 0);
00088         size_t t_col = test_points(i, 1);
00089         double t_val = test_points(i, 2);
00090         double temp = (t_val - WH(t_row, t_col));
00091         temp *= temp;
00092         rmse += temp;
00093       }
00094       rmse /= num_test_points;
00095       rmse = sqrt(rmse);
00096     }
00097 
00098     iteration++;
00099   
00100     if((rmseOld - rmse) / rmseOld < tolerance && iteration > 4)
00101     {
00102       if(reverseStepCount == 0 && isCopy == false)
00103       {
00104         isCopy = true;
00105         this->W = W;
00106         this->H = H;
00107         c_indexOld = rmseOld;
00108         c_index = rmse;
00109       }
00110       reverseStepCount++;
00111     }
00112     else
00113     {
00114       reverseStepCount = 0;
00115       if(rmse <= c_indexOld && isCopy == true)
00116       {
00117         isCopy = false;
00118       }
00119     }
00120 
00121     if(reverseStepCount == reverseStepTolerance || iteration > maxIterations)
00122     {
00123       if(isCopy)
00124       {
00125         W = this->W;
00126         H = this->H;
00127         rmse = c_index;
00128       }
00129       return true;
00130     }
00131     else return false;
00132   }
00133   
00134   const double& Index() { return rmse; }
00135 
00136   const size_t& Iteration() { return iteration; }
00137   
00138   const size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00139 
00140  private:
00141   double tolerance;
00142   size_t maxIterations;
00143   size_t num_test_points;
00144   size_t iteration;
00145 
00146   arma::Mat<double> test_points;
00147 
00148   double rmseOld;
00149   double rmse;
00150 
00151   size_t reverseStepTolerance;
00152   size_t reverseStepCount;
00153   
00154   bool isCopy;
00155   arma::mat W;
00156   arma::mat H;
00157   double c_indexOld;
00158   double c_index;
00159 };
